name: Shark Dash, Super Speed
description: from the old prototype of Shark Dash, I have developed a newer, better version, Shark Dash, Super Speed. Dodge turtles, dolphins, orcas, seals, explosive pufferfish, exploding cows and birds. Catch as many fish as you can while surviving! you can now shield and attack enemies as well! If you get 100 fish and you have killed 100 enemies you unlock a MEGALODON!!!
